properties.name: camel.dataformat.tarfile.allow-empty-directory
properties.description: If the tar file has more then one entry, setting this option to true, allows to get the iterator even if the directory is empty

properties.name: camel.dataformat.tarfile.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the tarfile data format. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.tarfile.max-decompressed-size
properties.description: Set the maximum decompressed size of a tar file (in bytes). The default value if not specified corresponds to 1 gigabyte. An IOException will be thrown if the decompressed size exceeds this amount. Set to -1 to disable setting a maximum decompressed size.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.tarfile.preserve-path-elements
properties.description: If the file name contains path elements, setting this option to true, allows the path to be maintained in the tar file.

properties.name: camel.dataformat.tarfile.using-iterator
properties.description: If the tar file has more then one entry, the setting this option to true, allows to work with the splitter EIP, to split the data using an iterator in a streaming mode.
